data.oai_dc:dc: Alien and native species richness and abundance

The file contains all data used in the statistical analyses described in the materials and methods section of the article. "Port" = name of the fifteen surveyed sites, "Trap position" = environment where the traps were placed in each of the fifteen surveyed sites (forest vs port), "Alien species richness" = mean number of alien species trapped per trap check, "Alien species abundance" =mean number of alien individuals trapped per trap check, "Native species richness" = mean number of native species trapped per trap check, "Native species abundance" =mean number of native individuals trapped per trap check.
Bark beetles|Exotic species|Forest pests|Invasion|Jewel beetles|Landscape|Longhorn beetles|Monitoring|Species interception|Surveillance
